intro.title: hello, i'm jenny! ‚Çä ‚äπ
description: I am a software engineer @ Microsoft working on the Azure SDK team, an artist, and musician.

Previously, I've worked @ *Amazon, GoodRx*, researched LLMs + AR for accessibility @ [Makeability Lab](https://makeabilitylab.cs.washington.edu/member/jennypeng/), & taught hardware/software interface @ [*Paul G. Allen School*](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse351/).
I currently enjoy full-stack engineering, game dev, new media. I will always enjoy dabbling in any form of creative self-expression.

projects.title: jam journal ‚ÇäÀö‚ô¨
description: For people like me that love music and analyzing it!
Import songs and control playback via the YouTube API, take notes on specific songs, and add timestamped or lyric-specific annotations while listening in-app.
projects.footer: typescript, next.js, supabase, sql, youtube api

projects.title: portfolio website
description: this website!
projects.footer: typescript, next.js, tailwind css, motion js

projects.title: AR RC car racing üèéÔ∏è
description: Multiplayer AR racing game allowing players in the same room to compete on custom, **environment-aware, procedurally-generated racetracks.**
Built for [VR Capstone](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse481v/25sp/demo-day/) course in a team of 4, using Meta Quest.

projects.title: AR Student Emotion Analyzer üò•
description: Real-time system using emotion classification, live transcription, and AR to provide live instructor feedback during lecture when students are confused.
projects.footer: python, c#, tensorflow, unity, YOLO, whisper, pandas, gpt

projects.title: crown of persuasion üëë
description: Visual novel / 2D platformer where you are a sentient crown that grants your wearer immense persuasive ability, and are responsible for choosing a new village leader.
Implemented dialogue system from scratch, animated player characters, and co-wrote story. Built in 3 weeks for Pirate Game Jam 16, with theme *"you are the weapon."*

projects.title: runring
description: AR game that transforms reality into a platform ring collection game to motivate you to run. Produced game music :p
Built for Snap Spectacles in 24 hours during [Dubhacks 2024](), placing 3rd in Snap side challenge.

projects.title: distributed key-value store
description: Implemented a linearizable, sharded key-value store with multi-key updates and dynamic load balancing for [CSE452](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse452/).

projects.title: saavy - personalized fashion assistant
description: AI shopping assistant that learns your style and only suggests products in your style.
Built with a team of engineers and MBA students for [CSE589: Software Entrepreneurship](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse589/24wi/), and was unanimously voted as the top team by 16 VCs.
My contributions: UI and product design + pitched 3x to VCs.

projects.title: shameify
description: Chrome extension that shames you while online shopping, to combat overconsumption. An LLM roasts your ethics based on the product details.
Built for [Treehacks 2024](https://2024.treehacks.com/).

projects.title: operating system
description: Implemented an operating system with multi-processing syscalls, inter-process communication with pipe, exec, user-level heap and shell, and crash-safe concurrent file system functionality for [CSE451](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse451/)

projects.title: nobull
description: Combats the spread of misinformation by fact checking verbal claims made in Tiktoks.
Honorable mention @ [Dubhacks 2023](https://dh23.dubhacks.co/).

projects.title: quagga
description: Trivia game web app that acts as a fun icebreaker to foster easier connections between strangers.
Players submit custom questions, answer them, and vote on who they think wrote an answer.
Won Slalom Game Jam side challenge @ [Dubhacks 2022](https://dh22.dubhacks.co/).

projects.title: mob
description: Web app that helps users decide where and when to eat with friends.
Placed in the top 3 finalists for the studio track @ [Dubhacks 2021](https://dh21.dubhacks.co/) and won Facebook Social Good award.

experience.title: Software Engineer @ Microsoft
description: Working on improving developer experience for creating + releasing Azure SDKs!

experience.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant @ [UW Makeability Lab](https://makeabilitylab.cs.washington.edu/)
description: Developed an LLM-powered AR pipeline using Unity, C#, gpt-4o, and prompt engineering to enable deaf and hard-of-hearing (DHH) users to author personalized, real-time sound-reactive AR interfaces.

experience.title: Junior Software Developer @ Amazon
description: ‚Ä¢ Enhanced clarity of web pages used by 300+ associates across 5 book manufacturing sites.
‚Ä¢ Reduced on-call load and average device downtime by implementing a UI popup that gives workers visibility into known technical issues.
‚Ä¢ Migrated a printer configuration feature, enabling a print setting for a specific printer model.
‚Ä¢ Disambiguated legacy Java code and complex SQL queries, enabling faster completion of a critical dashboard redesign.
experience.footer: typescript, react, java, graphql, dynamodb, aws, python, sql, golang

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern @ GoodRx
description: ‚Ä¢ Accelerated incident investigation across all engineering teams by implementing ownership attribution across GraphQL domains, creating custom metrics, and increasing granularity of Datadog monitoring.
‚Ä¢ Designed GraphQL schema, query resolvers, and API clients in Typescript, enabling frontend clients to fetch user location data to surface relevant search results.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant @ [Paul G. Allen School](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse351/)
description: ‚Ä¢ Taught weekly classes to 30 students, refined course materials for 150+ students, and provided debugging guidance for labs about buffer overflow exploits, x86-64 assembly, cache policies, and dynamic memory allocation.

experience.title: Student @ University of Washington
description: B.S. in Computer Science and Engineering, GPA: 3.81
